Sentencas: Maximizing the total fuel utilization is crucial to improving the electrical efficiency of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) systems.
Titulo: Analysis and design for hydrogen-fueled cascade solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Cascade SOFC systems can effectively achieve this goal, but there are fewer studies on hydrogen-fueled cascade SOFC systems.
Titulo: Analysis and design for hydrogen-fueled cascade solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Therefore, further analysis of cascade systems is necessary, especially in determining the optimal cell number ratio, which significantly impacts system efficiency.
Titulo: Analysis and design for hydrogen-fueled cascade solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Because of the characteristics of cascade systems, a model that can quickly predict performance at different flow rates and hydrogen molar fractions is required.
Titulo: Analysis and design for hydrogen-fueled cascade solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Using multiple sets of experimental data, an improved semi-empirical model was developed, which accurately predicted the industrial-sized cell performance at different flow rates and hydrogen molar fractions, and was validated by interpolation and extrapolation.
Titulo: Analysis and design for hydrogen-fueled cascade solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Based on this, a basic system model and a cascade system model were established.
Titulo: Analysis and design for hydrogen-fueled cascade solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: The effects of fuel flow rate, cell number ratio, split ratio, and the constraints of cell fuel utilization and voltage on the system performance were investigated and analyzed, and appropriate design and operating parameters for the cascade system were determined.
Titulo: Analysis and design for hydrogen-fueled cascade solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: The results indicated that the optimal cell number ratio is between 2 and 3, and the optimal split ratio is 1.
Titulo: Analysis and design for hydrogen-fueled cascade solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: In industrial scenarios requiring high fuel utilization operation, the cascade system can significantly improve electrical efficiency while reducing cell fuel utilization compared to the basic system.
Titulo: Analysis and design for hydrogen-fueled cascade solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: In the case of a 10-kW rated power system design, the cascade system showed an increase in electrical efficiency from 39.0% to 42.2% up to from 47.6% to 52.7% at rated power compared to the basic system, representing an improvement of 8.6% to 10.5% and a reduction in fuel flow rate of 19.2% to 20.4%.
Titulo: Analysis and design for hydrogen-fueled cascade solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: The results obtained provide valuable reference for related research and offer guidance for system design.
Titulo: Analysis and design for hydrogen-fueled cascade solid oxide fuel cell system
